title: Client looks weird and I can't chat or find hextech crafting
body:
http://i.imgur.com/PxRyQYn.jpg

Possibly old old client go into my patch somehow?

replies.body: Well that is quite the interesting bug. That's a really old client (don't know when it was active tho).
Haha that's what I was thinking. How can I redownload the latest patch?

I want to say uninstall and reinstall, but that would take a while for sure. You can probably find some solution if you look up the problem on google or something. Best of luck in getting your client fixed man!
Thanks for the feedback dude! Apparently if you click the '?' in the launch client, you can repair your patch. It fixed it. :)
So when people tell me to uninstall, they are really just helping me?

If this is a troll...

well done.
Haha NOT A TROLL XD I just assumed it was part of the transition to the new client, but by repairing my patch this has been fixed :)
If it isn't a troll... holy shit Rito what happened XDDDD
